title: Second Chances: An Oaktown Story
description: Grace returns home to Oaktown after running away a few years ago. She wants to make things right with her 5 year old daughter and her parents. Upon her return she finds that second chances don't come so easy. She begins to wonder if there even is such a thing. Meanwhile, she finds herself in an all out war to save her daughter's favorite park from the richest and meanest woman in town. She also finds sparks between her and her lifelong best friend, David. Could there be more there than just friendship? This is a Christian story of redemption and love.
author: Jenny  Lynn
